text: The Lovebirds is a 2020 American romantic comedy action mystery thriller movie directed by Michael Showalter. The movie stars Issa Rae and Kumail Nanjiani, as well as Paul Sparks, Anna Camp, and Kyle Bornheimer. It is about a couple who goes on the run after witnessing a murder. It was supposed to be released by Paramount Pictures on April 3, 2020, but the movie was delayed due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Its rights were then sold to Netflix, which released the movie digitally on May 22, 2020. The movie had mixed reviews with a 67% on Rotten Tomatoes. ==References== Category:2020 action movies Category:2020 thriller movies Category:2020s action comedy movies Category:2020s action thriller movies Category:2020 romantic comedy movies Category:2020s mystery movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Netflix movies
title: The Lovebirds (2020 movie)
